subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Davis, a 6-foot-10 multiple-tool player who already gives opposing defenses fits, seems determined to keep expanding his game, and developing a decent 3-point shot is on his list.
snippet: Davis, a 6-foot-10 multiple-tool player who already gives opposing defenses fits, seems determined to keep expanding his game, and developing a decent 3-point shot is on his list.
